source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: Influencing Others
items.headline: How to influence through your interactions with others
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to improve personal effectiveness in building productive trust-based relationships; how to identify and discuss techniques in questioning, reasoning and asserting to improve rational persuasion and how to analyse methods in planning a productive interaction by considering zones of influence and control.

items.title: 8 Tactics to Influence Your Boss
items.headline: Learning these tactics will enable you to influence your boss.
objectives_summary: How to identify your boss meta programs (how he thinks)
How to adjust your communication to influence your boss
How to influence anyone

items.title: ABC to Build an Influencing Character
items.headline: Take charge of your own life.
objectives_summary: Everything in our life what we get or what we don't get, is simply the reflection of our influence. Knowingly or unknowingly we are influencing others or we are influenced by others. In this course one can able to learn the simple 11 steps How to influence everyone whom we come accross in our everyday life.
Purpose of doing
Learn about appearance

items.title: The Recipe to Public Speaking Success | 2021
items.headline: Precisely learn the keys to public speaking success and become a confident communicator!
objectives_summary: Public Speaking Concepts
Public Speaking Techniques
Fundamentals of Effective Speaking

items.title: Public Speaking: Involve And Engage Your Audience
items.headline: Learn how to move the audience in an active and participative role, handle Q&A and all the techniques that can help you
objectives_summary: Engage the audience, increase their participation in a presentation or speech and more likely to side the presenter message

items.title: Feminist Activism 101
items.headline: How to Contribute, Lead, and Make a Positive Impact with the New Feminism Revolution
objectives_summary: Be able to contribute, lead, and make a positive impact with the new feminism revolution

items.title: The Human Game - Manipulation, Deception & Lie Detection
items.headline: Taught By a Spy
objectives_summary: Concepts of Manipulation, Deception & Lie Detection

items.title: 10+ Effective Negotiation Skills and 5 Interactive Lessons
items.headline: Stand out with negotiation tips, tricks and interactive practice exercises to quickly master effective negotiation
objectives_summary: Essential, practical and proven negotiation skills to build lifelong strategies for success!
Stand out in your career by forming stable long-term successful negotiation habits
Dynamic interactive practice sections to master hands-on negotiation quickly

items.title: Youtube SEOs - A simple guide to success!
items.headline: How to become an expert in YouTube success for 30 minutes!
objectives_summary: Developing your channel's statistics
Creating thumbnails
Categorizing videos

items.title: Influencing Someone by reading Eye Patterns & Body Language
items.headline: Eye Pattern, Body Language & Representational System
objectives_summary: Eye movement and how to interpret them
Body Language and how to interpret them
You will learn how to understand people without even talking to them

items.title: 7 Scientifically Proven Steps to Increase Your Influence
items.headline: Learn the science of charisma. Increase your impact, influence and income using 7 science based steps.
objectives_summary: Be the most memorable person in the room
Get the job you want
Increase your influence

items.title: Presentation Skills Secrets:Delivering the Talk of Your Life
items.headline: Learn from a TED and TEDx Speaker the Secrets of Talk Development and Storytelling to Transform Your Communications.
objectives_summary: Deliver highly effective and resonant presentations
Craft meaningful communications to any audience
Clearly articulate their ideas to get them across

items.title: Persuasion Psychology: 5 Proven Tips
items.headline: Discover the Science of Persuasion and Use Psychology to Persuade and Influence with Persuasive Words
objectives_summary: Persuade people to change their opinions.
Influence people's behavior
Understand your own potential to be persuaded

items.title: Communication Styles for Stronger Social Skills
items.headline: How to adapt your communication styles to improve your relationship and influence with the people around you.
objectives_summary: Becoming more flexible in communicating to different people
Understand how to improve relationships with 'difficult' people

items.title: Self-Advocacy: Be Your Own Champion

visible_instructors.title: Shelley Osborne
visible_instructors.name: Shelley
visible_instructors.job_title: Learning & Development Expert, Ed Tech Evangelist

items.headline: Cultivate your assertive communication skills to effectively advocate for yourself and your needs in work and life.
objectives_summary: Define self-advocacy and its value in work and life
Differentiate between passive, aggressive, and assertive communication
Discover your typical communication style

items.title: How to be confident with resilient mindset
items.headline: Change your life with developing your mindset to positivity
objectives_summary: How to manage stress and handle the problem
Being resilient to overcome problems
Managing emotions
